name: cute animal pictures & sounds
description:
Cute animal pictures & animal sounds / noises is one of the best educational games for kids with animal sounds, animal noises and animal pictures, which helps kids to entertain and help parents to teach kids about animals and birds. It can also be used to make animal calls, animal noises or even animal cries due to the wide selection of animal sounds!

🔊 COOL SELECTION OF ANIMAL NOISES & SOUNDS
This animal sounds app includes more than 60 sounds of animals and birds. With this sounds animal for kids app, toddlers can easy entertain them self with easy navigation. The cool thing about the animal noises is how easy they are played. With a simple tap and with simple exploration you can easily find and play them at a glance.


🐘ANIMAL PICTURES
This learning app, wouldn’t be great if there aren’t animal pictures. So we made sure to includes lots of animal pictures (real and drawings) together with the animal sound & animal calls. The visuals and graphics are extremely appealing and kid friendly. So, let them learn the names, know how to differ the animals and aid their development, simple and easy. The most complete toddler learning app!

❤WHY YOU’LL LOVE CUTE ANIMALS:
- widest selection of 60+ sounds animal & animals noises
- crystal clear audio
- simple UI and lots of animal calls & animal cries sounds
- great variety of animal pictures (real and drawings)
- lovely sound effects
- fun learning app for toddlers and kids
